nodes.text: The Jumimi was a Carrack-class light cruiser used by Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin. The Jumimi was part of an attempt to destroy the Deep Space Manufacturing Facility ZA-13. However, the cruiser was destroyed by Tan Maarek Stele.
In TIE Fighter the Jumimi was called Z-Jumimi to remind the player that it was under the command of Zaarin, but in the game guide it was erroneously called Gemini.
